front.title: PE-based Multicast Framework for IPv6 Transition

abstract.t: The Internet sometimes faces such scenario that: a set of customer networks are connected to a transit core who delivers messages for them, to communicate with each other; the massages from one customer network to another are tunneled to pass through the transit core. The tunnels are known as "softwires". It has been described in [I-D.ietf-softwire-mesh-framework] . The customer networks may also need to run IP multicast applications across the transit core. This memo provides a PE-based multicast framework for IPv6 transition.
